title: My account has been hacked help?
body: Is there any direct way other than email to contact Riot? for come reason I am still logged into my account on the forums but they have someone changed my email and password since last night

replies.body:
Within 10 minutes of the ticket being submitted a Moderator had contacted me via email and have retrieved my account.

Would like to thank Seras Dragon and Ancazor (Riot Games Player Support) for the help if only the whole of OCE community was like this it would be a lot better environment and a lot more enjoyable games on the rift
As I am still logged in somehow on the forums is there someone a moderator can flog this post to assist with my account recovery?
I have tried filling the request out twice and it freeze's on Submit

Submit an an account recovery ticket, you don't need to log into submit them for obvious reasons.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
